Name: おんがくしつ / MUSIC ROOM
About the game: This game is a J-horror game in which a friend invites you to go to school to test your courage. The main character is invited by his friend to go to the school for a test of courage. The protagonist is invited by his friend to go to school to test his mettle, but as soon as he arrives at the school, his friend blocks the entrance and tells him to go to the music room alone. What's in the music room? Why is it so popular to test your courage at school in class? Game System This game is a walking simulator. Controls Movement: WASD + Mouse Action: E Option: ESC Play time About 5 minutes
